The image was posted on Twitter on July: 2020, and has been shared more than 2,000 times.
The Indonesian: language caption of the tweet translates to English as: "Has anyone ever tried this...???"
The image shows a pack of ramen noodles: with the brand logo visible in the top left-hand corner.
The yellow text overlaid on the red back: Pork Saksang Flavour", referring to a traditional savory pork dish from the Batak ethnic group in Sumatra, Indonesia.
